module.name: Web Callback
module.description: COMMERCIAL MODULE REQUIRES A LICENSE FOR IT TO FUNCTION. Please visit www.schmoozecom.com/oss.php. The Web Call Me module allows you to easily add an HTML call me box to your website. Visitors simply put their phone number in to be connected with you, or a specific destination. The Web Callback module allows you to specify a CID to be prepended which alerts you that the call is coming from a specific callback. You can also set Dial Matches to specify which numbers users are allows to call. Once you have set your destination and saved changes you will be given HTML code to paste into your website.
module.changelog: *13.0.11.2* FREEPBX-15061 Multiple Web Callback can be added with same Name, FREEPBX-15063 List Web Callback and Add Web Callback option missing under Web Callback module edit layout. *13.0.11.1* Internal Fixes *13.0.11* PHP 5.6 Updates *13.0.10* FREEBX-11725 Fix number prepend input *13.0.9* Remove en_US Translations *13.0.8* FREEPBX-11112 *13.0.7* Slideout menu *13.0.6* Functionality and visual fixes on the default button *13.0.5* FREEPBX-10027 URL Fix destination *13.0.4* FREEPBX-9829 URL created invalid *13.0.3* Invalid array loop bug *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha1* Visual Updates *12.0.1* Zend fixes *2.11.0.5* Sales page cleanup *2.11.0.2* Allow override of our contact form *2.11.0.1* Remove the Power by Schmooze line from images *2.11.0.0* Bump for 2.11 *2.10.0.19* default dial matches if none are set *2.10.0.18* Packaging of ver 2.10.0.18 *2.10.0.17* Packaging of ver 2.10.0.17 *2.10.0.16* re #1305 - add num prepend *2.10.0.15* Packaging of ver 2.10.0.15
